当我凝视深渊的时候，感到的是深深的孤独，固然人还是得跟人一起生活，不是机器。
总之强烈推荐！

멀미 참고 5시간 정도 했는데 진짜 속이 뒤집어 지는 것 같지만, 그래도 좋음ㅎㅎ

it gucci

Game's great. It has the right balance of everything, and is leaps and bounds ahead of Portal 1. (But make sure to know the story of Portal 1 first. Preferrably through playing it.)

My one nit-pick from replaying it recently is that the campaign maps have a lot of loading screens transitions.
As with many cross-platform PC releases of its day, I'm guessing the old console hardware made this a requirement.

Good luck ignoring how often the game needs to load inbetween maps now that I complained about it. Sorry.
Got this game to share with my gf but turns out that we can't play it together unless she buys the game too. still a great game none the less. not worth more of my money, at least for me.
